entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
